Package org.springframework.core.test.tools

Annotation Interface CompileWithForkedClassLoader

@Retention(RUNTIME) @Target({TYPE,METHOD}) @Documented @ExtendWith(org.springframework.core.test.tools.CompileWithForkedClassLoaderExtension.class) public @interface CompileWithForkedClassLoader
Annotation that registers a JUnit Jupiter extension for test classes or test methods that need to use a forked classloader with compiled code.

The extension allows the compiler to define classes without polluting the test ClassLoader.

NOTE: this annotation cannot be used in conjunction with @TestTemplate methods. Consequently, @RepeatedTest and @ParameterizedTest methods are not supported.

Since:
6.0
Author:
Phillip Webb, Sam Brannen
